cause.description:
We would like to raise awareness of developmental disibilities in classrooms and povide students with those disibilities programs suited to their needs.
1. Children with special needs education should not be forced to endure education that is not tailored to their needs.
2. Education is a right, and privilege that these children have earned.
3. The children of today are the leaders of tommorow.
cause.mission: Raise awareness of developmental disibilities in classrooms and povide students with those disibilities programs suited to their needs.
cause.name: Developmental Disabilities
